value: To delve deeper into certain topics, science classes are divided into distinct disciplines (Physics, History, Biology, Chemistry). While History Tracers aligns with this approach, the manner in which subjects are taught can sometimes lead students to perceive the sciences as isolated entities, thus creating barriers to understanding. To help students overcome this obstacle, this section of the curriculum integrates the sciences.
